title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1204.4 - Custody by the Office of General Services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1204.4 - Custody by the Office of General Services

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part the Office of General Services
shall be considered to have custody of all buildings leased pursuant to chapter
152 of the Laws of 1964 or chapter 354 of the Laws of 1963 and of all buildings
within the statutory jurisdiction of the Office of General Services which have
not been transferred by lease into the custody of a leasee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1204.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
